attributes.action: Reject David Cameron's resignation and seek continuation as Prime Minister.
attributes.background: Following the referendum to leave the EU we feel there is no suitable replacement for David Cameron.  We also feel that as the country only re-elected David Cameron as Prime Minister one year ago, he has a duty to continue in his position for the good of the country for the full term.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
